title: Bug 9654: Modify Parameters: Dialog details
description: Bug 9654Modify Parameters: Dialog details duplicated name validation could be performed on the first pagei. the first and second column could be mergedj.
OB: a. The buttons in the dialog are too small. b. When the dialog comes up, no table entry is selected. However, both move buttons are enabled. c. When changing a parameter name to something very long, the preview is cut off. d. The dialog comes up huge for methods with many parameters.
EB: The buttons in the dialog should be of an appropriate size. When the dialog comes up, a table entry should be selected. The move buttons should be disabled if there are no table entries. When changing a parameter name to something very long, the preview should not be cut off. The dialog should resize appropriately for methods with many parameters.
SR:
1. Open the dialog for modifying parameters.
2. Observe the size of the buttons.
3. Observe if a table entry is selected when the dialog comes up.
4. Change a parameter name to something very long and observe if the preview is cut off.
5. Observe the size of the dialog for methods with many parameters.
